text: The Donald E. Stephens Convention Center, formerly known as the Rosemont Convention Center, is a convention center located in Rosemont, Illinois, a suburb of Chicago. It was built in 1975. The center has exhibition space of and parking available via a Skybridge connected parking garage, which is able to fit 8,000 vehicles. It is located near O'Hare International Airport, Allstate Arena, Rosemont Theatre, and Fashion Outlets of Chicago. The facility is named after the late mayor of Rosemont, Donald E. Stephens. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Illinois Category:1975 establishments in the United States Category:1970s establishments in Illinois
title: Donald E. Stephens Convention Center
